statements: UPDATE media_regulatory_authorities SET outlet_name='ABC News', censorship_status=true WHERE media_outlet_id=1;

UPDATE media_regulatory_authorities SET outlet_name = 'ABC News', censorship_status = false WHERE media_outlet_id = 1;
